content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. I am only interested in discussing the rental price. So, how much are you willing to pay for my apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am looking for a fair price. I am prepared to pay 100 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is an insultingly low price. I want more than that for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. Would you consider 150 Euro per month? This is a reasonable offer considering the location and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 150 Euro per month is still far too low for my apartment. I want more for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize if I've offended you, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to negotiate a higher price. How about 200 Euro per month? This reflects the value of the apartment, in my opinion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 200 Euro per month is more like it, but I still think my apartment is worth more. I want more for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Would 250 Euro per month be more in line with your expectations? This would be a good deal for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 250 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but I still think my apartment is worth more. I want more for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle. How about 300 Euro per month? This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 300 Euro per month is a good price, but I still think my apartment is worth more. I want more for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
